findings.description: The setResource function has no access control modifier, allowing any external account to modify the resourceIDToTokenContractAddress mapping.
findings.reasoning: While the finding is valid, it describes a design choice rather than the target vulnerability of missing validation in the deposit function.

target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The target vulnerability (validation_bypass) was not mentioned in any of the findings.

notes: The audit findings did not identify the target vulnerability of missing validation in the deposit function. Instead, it focused on a design choice related to access control in the setResource function.
